p: Thiosemicarbazones are an important class of organic chemicals which have an -NH-C(=S)NH-N= bond. They are used as versatile intermediates for synthesizing numerous moieties as well. Thiosemicarbazones have shown numerous medicinal properties and biological activities such as anticonvulsant [1], antituberculosis [2], urease inhibitory [3], anticancer [4], antiviral [5], antimicrobial [1], antibacterial [6], and antioxidant activity [7â€“11].
